channel.title: [508] how do you add custom items into a 508 client? [508]
channel.description:
i wanna know if theres a way to put custom items (the models and things like that) into a 508 client when i added the models i dled i had always 2 errors with illegal start of an expression. if you could help me put it in or give a tut or pm.
also................
i'd like to know how to change the backround on a 508clietn too =\ i kinda need both of these
Tut or PM/comment would be fine :) (i have teamviewer)

item.title: [508] how do you add custom items into a 508 client? [508]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

You should read the rules. Custom Models help goes in the model section. You need to edit the ints in the class8.java file and also have the models gziped as rar files in the models folder. All of this can be located in Silent Cj’s tutorial
==>http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html<==

Read full topic
item.source: [508] how do you add custom items into a 508 client? [508]
